name: Speed Cop Stunt Car Simulator
description: Speed Cop Car Simulator: Stunt Racing 2018 is an amazing car driving game where user will serve as police officer by driving Speed Cop Car Simulator in chasing robbers and do stunts as hero in stunt racing 2018.  Drive speed cop car on amazing colorful Tracks and have extreme driving fun in speed cop car driving games. Select your favorite cop car and colorful stunt track and sits on the riding seat and enjoy many of stunts while performing super stunts. Controls your high-speed cop cars and enjoy the realistic controls with vigorous graphics that will make your ride enjoyable. By choosing your favorite speed Police cop cars, you get chance to ride in your lovely speedy cop cars like jeeps, Parado and SUV to enjoy the high speed of racing in different colorful tracks which makes you happy. Rider has to face some hurdles in the shape of cool flips, bowling balls amazing jumping ramps and footballs. Explore the whole colorful superhero tracks with a range of unlockable British police cars! Turn on the police sirens and switch between multiple siren sounds! Once you're finished your first level you can move to another level with more difficult and more colorful superhero effects tracks.
